title: Inside Bar
content:
Inside Bar indicator highlights series of bars which bodies are within the range between the high and low of the first bar in each highlighted series. The Tolerance parameters allow you to set an acceptable tolerance of the candle's body from the high/low.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Tolerance

NameDescription
Mode Defines one of the available tolerance units.

Options:
  • Ticks
  • Absolute price
  • Percent
Value Determines the size of the tolerance.
Candle area Defines one of the available candle areas.

Options:
  • High-Low
  • Candle body height

Visualization

NameDescription
Area Color Sets the color for a specific area on the chart.
